attributes.title: D’Angelo Parody Music Video
attributes.caption: Zach Anner delivers on his Buff Buddies promise and makes the sexiest, sweatiest, hairiest D'Angelo parody video you've ever not seen. Just try to not stare at his perfect nipples. We dare you.
attributes.description: Zach Anner delivers on his Buff Buddies promise and makes the sexiest, sweatiest, hairiest D'Angelo parody video you've ever not seen. Just try to not stare at his perfect nipples. We dare you.

attributes.title: What Your Shirt Says
attributes.caption: Can't decide what to wear? Worried you're flashing too much nipple? See what your shirt says about you with this handy Rooster Teeth style guide.
attributes.description: Can't decide what to wear? Worried you're flashing too much nipple? See what your shirt says about you with this handy Rooster Teeth style guide.

attributes.title: Bloopers and Outtakes
attributes.caption: Sometimes, when we're filming dramatic art pieces about dog murder, nude guys in wheelchairs, or Tinder mishaps, we forget a line or two. We might even laugh. It only shows that we're human. Deeply disturbed, twisted humans.
attributes.description: Sometimes, when we're filming dramatic art pieces about dog murder, nude guys in wheelchairs, or Tinder mishaps, we forget a line or two. We might even laugh. It only shows that we're human. Deeply disturbed, twisted humans.

attributes.title: The Henchman
attributes.caption: While Batman and Superman duke it out, we look into the life of a Gotham City henchman.
attributes.description: While Batman and Superman duke it out, we look into the life of a Gotham City henchman.

attributes.title: How to Not Look Stupid in a VR Headset
attributes.caption: With all radical advances in technology, early adopters are doomed to look like complete fucking idiots until the rest of the world gets accustomed to seeing people in that context. For VR headsets, that day is a long way away. Lucky for you...
attributes.description: With all radical advances in technology, early adopters are doomed to look like complete fucking idiots until the rest of the world gets accustomed to seeing people in that context. For VR headsets, that day is a long way away. Lucky for you, we've put together a list of ways you can trick people into thinking you look cool.
attributes.display_title: How to Not Look Stupid in a VR Headset

attributes.title: TWENTY-SOMETHING NINJA TURTLES!
attributes.caption: It's hard fighting crime when it pays nothing and you've got student loans
attributes.description: It's hard fighting crime when it pays nothing and you've got student loans. And don't get me started on rent prices. $1500 for a one bedroom?! How am I supposed to move out of Splinter's basement? This is the baby boomer turtles' fault.

attributes.title: The 22 WORST PLACES to Play Pokemon Go
attributes.caption: With everyone forgetting to look up from their phones, Pokemon Go is causing some real world problems
attributes.description: Thieves using lures to rob people. People finding dead bodies in fields. This shit just got real.
